ValidationRule.description: Breadth must be less than or equal to zero when Crate Type is No Crate . Supports Only
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF ( AND ( RecordType.Name = 'Master',ISPICKVAL(Crate_Type__c , "No Crate. Supports Only" ) , Breadth__c > 0 ) , TRUE, FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Breadth must be less than or equal to zero when Crate Type is No Crate . Supports Only
